About.title: Quality Sealed (QS): Excellence in Premium Food Packaging
About.content: Established in 2014, Quality Sealed (QS) has become a renowned name in the realm of premium food packaging. As pioneers in thermoformed plastic trays for the food industry, we specialize in producing High Barrier products that safeguard food, preserve freshness, retain the aroma, and extend the shelf life of your valuable products.

About.title: Customer Satisfaction is Our Driving Force
About.content: At QS, customer satisfaction and surpassing expectations are at the heart of everything we do. We have a proven track record of successful collaborations with both large and small businesses, and we are fully equipped to devise tailored strategies using high-quality materials that perfectly align with your specific needs.

About.title: Cutting-Edge Technology for Exceptional Solutions
About.content: Equipped with state-of-the-art technology, we understand the stringent requirements that food product packaging demands. Our diverse range of packaging solutions encompasses meats, fish, salads, and ready meals, whether they require chilling or freezing. With our advanced high barrier tray technology, we can extend the shelf life and preserve the freshness of your products using Modified Atmosphere Packaging (MAP) or Vacuum Skin Pack (VSP) processes.

About.title: Unleashing the Power of Customization
About.content: At QS, we take pride in presenting our customers with optimal solutions. Our passion lies in continuously developing the products we offer, ensuring they meet your unique requirements. Additionally, our expertise extends to creating special customized high-barrier trays designed specifically for your business needs.

About.title: Materials & Technology: Innovating Packaging Solutions
About.content: As material developers at QS, we employ cutting-edge technology to deliver the latest packaging solutions. Our trays come in a variety of shapes, sizes, colors, and materials, featuring modern designs with one or more compartments. We utilize special custom machine tooling to craft high-quality products that surpass industry standards.

About.title: Certified Quality: Your Assurance of Excellence
About.content: At QS, we are committed to upholding the highest quality standards for all our trays. Our rigorous quality control and inspection system ensures that no defective goods leave our facilities. We diligently monitor quality control in every shift, conduct continuous inspections of production samples through our QA department, and ensure complete traceability.

About.title: Your Trustworthy Partner in Food Safety
About.content: Rest assured that QS products adhere to international food safety standards, offering you peace of mind and confidence in your packaging choices.

About.title: Explore Our Range of Premium High Barrier Trays
About.content: Discover the exceptional quality and functionality of QS High Barrier Trays specially designed for fresh products, frozen items, ready meals, microwave, retort applications, and more. With QS, you can elevate your packaging game and safeguard the flavor and aroma of your food products.
